name: Stykz Stick Figure
summary: Learn about .STYK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: STYK files can be added to the Stykz library by clicking the Add button in the Library palette, then selecting the stick figure to import. You can also drag a STYK file directly from the desktop to the Library palette to add it to the library.
Stykz animations are saved as .STYKZ files.

description: Stick figure created with Stykz, a simple animation program; also called a "Stykz figure;" contains a single stick figure or object designed with Stykz; saved in a standard format that can be shared between Stykz users.
